com.prc.alp.liaison.acl
Class RETSINAWeatherMessageParser

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.prc.alp.liaison.acl.RETSINAWeatherMessageParser
public class RETSINAWeatherMessageParser
extends java.lang.Object

The RETSINAWeatherMessageParser class extracts weather information from a RETSINA weather info agent message.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.1

Method Detail

getDebug

public boolean getDebug()
Retrieves the current debug status for this parser.
Returns:
A value of true indicating that debug output is enabled orfalse indicating that debug output is disabled.

setDebug

public void setDebug(boolean flag)
Sets the current debug status for this parser.
Parameters:
flag - A value of true means to enable debug output, while a false means to disable debug output.

parseCurrent

public java.lang.String parseCurrent(java.lang.String content)
Extracts current weather information from a RETSINA weather InfoAgent reply.
Parameters:
content - The raw text of the complete reply returned by the RETSINA agent
Returns:
Current weather conditions at a previously requested location as reported by the RETSINA agent

parseForecast

public java.lang.Object parseForecast(java.lang.String content)
Extracts weather forecast information from a RETSINA weather InfoAgent reply.
Parameters:
content - The raw text of the complete reply returned by the RETSINA agent
Returns:
Weather forecast conditions at a previously requested location as reported by the RETSINA agent; currently structured as a Vector

extractReplyID

public java.lang.String extractReplyID(java.lang.String content)
Extracts an identification code from a RETSINA weather InfoAgent reply. This allows the reply to be matched to a prior request.
Parameters:
content - The raw text of the complete reply returned by the RETSINA agent
Returns:
The reply-with ID sent in the original request to the RETSINA agent

extractReplyWith

public java.lang.String extractReplyWith(java.lang.String content)
Extracts an identification code from a RETSINA weather InfoAgent reply. This allows the reply itself to be replied to in case of error.
Parameters:
content - The raw text of the complete reply returned by the RETSINA agent
Returns:
The reply-with ID sent the RETSINA agent's reply

extractContent

public java.lang.String extractContent(java.lang.String content)
Extracts the content field from a RETSINA weather InfoAgent reply. This contains the substantive weather information (either a forecast or current data).
Parameters:
content - The raw text of the complete reply returned by the RETSINA agent
Returns:
The weather forecast or current weather conditions returned by the RETSINA agent
